attributes.action: introduce an organisation to make sure police investigate every crime with 100% effort, regardless of the crime.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Below are some of the issues we feel strongly about:
* Having more PCSO's working on retail Parks (e.g. Megabowl and cinemas)
* Have a better Liason with victims of all crime at least within 24 hrs of the initial crime.
* Being able to speak to any police officer regarding a crime, as apose to 1 investigating officer (who may not be available)
* See more senior officers patrolling.
* See more Officers out at weekend nights.
